podcasts.title: Serial
podcasts.author: Serial Productions
podcasts.description: Serial returns with a history of Guantánamo told by people who lived through key moments in Guantánamo’s evolution, who know things the rest of us don’t about what it’s like to be caught inside an improvised justice system.
podcasts.title: Rolling Stone's 500 Greatest Songs
podcasts.author: iHeartPodcasts
podcasts.description: This exclusive podcast from Rolling Stone tells the stories behind the “500 Greatest Songs of All Time."
podcasts.title: Murder in the Hollywood Hills
podcasts.author: NBC News
podcasts.description: Kristi Johnson was shopping at a mall in Los Angeles when a man invited her to a photo shoot for the next Bond film. That afternoon, the 21-year-old got into her little white sportscar and drove to the shoot location up in the Hollywood Hills. She was never seen alive again.
